post_detail.description:
What this case study demonstrates:

Our ability to combine event production with interactive development and video production. Our ability to collaborate amongst many different agency and client partners

Challenge:

Clickfire Media worked with BBDO and their client, Jennie-O, to produce a five-day, online and offline, multi-location marketing promotion across New York City. The goal was to create social buzz, brand awareness, positive social chatter, and increase social following. We paired up with a popular food truck (Bistro Truck), and handed out thousands of free turkey burgers in an effort to get New Yorkers to "Make The Switch" to Jennie-O turkey.

Execution:

Unique burger recipes using the Jennie-O product were created by Bistro Truck chef, Yassir, for each of 5 high-traffic locations in NYC. We casted an improv comedy host to interview participants on the street, and we filmed at a different location each day of the 5-day promotion. We also produced a “themed photo shoot," each day to add variety to the digital content for the Facebook page. For instance, for the Mulberry Street Burger, CFM took character portraits to create a vintage Hipstamatic or Instagram styled photos, which were uploaded to the Jennie-O page, where people were encouraged to like and tag themselves. CFM also shot, edited and produced a total of six creative videos encompassing everything from man-on-the-street style interviews to a day in the life of a Jennie-O turkey burger. All the music was original, composed by Click 3X Sound Designer Brian Scribinico.

Results:

  • 2.5K+ turkey burgers handed out in 5 days
  • Produced 6 creative videos, as well as man on the street Style footage for each day’s promotion for Facebook
  • 1 million+ impressions on Facebook
  • The Jennie-O Facebook page grew by 35K+ likes in less than a month
  • 25K+ of the likes came during the five-day promotion
  • Thousands of Facebook updates and tweets generated.
